result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: of proceedings held before Hon. Greg Huber on 11-18-2015

ADDRESS INFO for Scott D Carolfi
Current: PO Box 700, c/o Dodge Corr Inst, Waupun, WI 53963 United States  (Effective: 01-19-2016)
Prior: 400 Market St, c/o Wood Co Jail, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54494 United States

ADDRESS INFO for Scott D Carolfi
Current: 400 Market St, c/o Wood Co Jail, Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54494 United States  (Effective: 12-03-2015)
Prior: M331 Hwy 97, Marshfield, WI 54449 United States

Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 9:47 am 
INCLUDES 13CF511, 13CF838, 13CM1896, and 14CF820. 
State appears by ADA D.Toldt; Defendant appears in person/in custody and with Attorney Pauline Toulouse.
Parties state agreement as to recommended sentencings.

COURT ORDERS: 
13CF511 - Ct. 1 (Theft/Repeater)>>3.5 years imprisonment - 18 months IC and 2 years ES. 
13CM1896 - Ct. 1 (Theft/Repeater)>>9 months MCJ. 
13CF838 - Ct. 1 (Burglary/Repeater)>>6 years imprisonment - 3 years IC and 3 years ES. 
13CF838 - Ct. 5 (Theft/Repeater)>>9 months MCJ. 
13CF838 - Ct. 6 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>3.5 years imprisonment - 1.5 years IC and 2 years ES. 
COURT ORDERS as conditions of ES - absolute sobriety from illegal drugs; payment of unpaid restitution; payment of unpaid costs. 
COURT ORDERS all sentences to run concurrent to each other. 
COURT finds the def is entitled to 106 days sentence credit on each charge. 
COURT finds def eligible for SAP and does NOT find him eligible for CIP. 
COURT notes any programs to help def deal with pain would be beneficial while def is incarcerated and on ES. 

Adj: 9:57 am
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Deanna.
Case called:  1:51 pm
Includes cases 13CF511, 13CF838, 13CM1896 and 14CF820.
State appears by ADA Amanda Jadin.  Def appears with Atty Suzanne O'Neill.
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  Preliminary Hearings Waiver filed by the Deft in CF files.  Information to be filed by State mirroring the Criminal Complaints.
Parties stipulate that the Deft is now competent.  Deft agrees regarding competency.
State moves to:
13CF511:
Ct 2 (Theft-Repeater)>>DRI
Ct 3 (Theft-Repeater)>>DRI
Ct 4 (Theft-Repeater)>>DRI
13CF838:
Ct 2 (Burglary-Repeater)>>DRI
Ct 3 (Theft-Repeater)>>DRI
Ct 4 (Theft-Repeater)>>DRI
Ct 7 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>DRI
13CM1896:
Ct 2 (Theft-Repeater)>>DRI
14CF820:
Ct 1 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI
Ct 2 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI
Ct 3 (BJ-Felony)>>DRI
Ct 4 (OAR)>>DRI
Ct 5 (BJ-Misd)>>DRI
Ct 6 (BJ-Misd)>>DRI
COURT GRANTS
PLEA:
13CF511:
Ct 1 (Theft-Repeater)>>GUILTY
13CF838:
Ct 1 (Burglary-Repeater)>>GUILTY
Ct 5 (Theft-Repeater)>>GUILTY
Ct 6 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>>GUILTY
13CM1896:
Ct 1 (Theft-Repeater)>>GUILTY
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 
13CF511:
Ct 1 (Theft-Repeater)>> &
13CF838:
Ct 1 (Burglary-Repeater)>>
Ct 6 (BJ-Felony-Repeater)>> &
13CM1896:
Ct 1 (Theft-Repeater)>>
SWH.  Probation for 5 years.  CONDITIONS:  Counseling deemed appropriate by agent, absolute sobriety; except prescribed medications as prescribed, ltr of apology to each vic, no contact with any of the vics or place of business, GFE at FTE/Schooling or combo - up to his ability, 100 hours of community service, DNA sample w/surcharge, CC, restitution hearing to be set in 13CF511.  Payment of restitution - $250 to CrimeStoppers and $771.00 to Alliant Energy.
13CF838: 
Ct 5 (Theft-Repeater)>> &
13CM1896:
Ct 1 (Theft-Repeater)>>
SWH.  Probation for 3 years w/same conditions.
Sentences are concurrent.

Adj:  2:13 pm

dft appeared 9/22/14 at Initials before Judge Moran
Origianl warrant returned from Sheriff's Dept.
